attributes.action: Compensation for university students due to covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Many strongly believe we’ve been neglected during this pandemic and it’s been incredibly frustrating. All our lectures have been online and yet we continue to pay full tuition fees and zero access to any of the university’s facilities or union.
attributes.background: We would like some kind of compensation for paying full tuition fees and no access to any of the university’s facilities. Many students are struggling financially because they can’t pay their rent, etc. We have been told that classes may resume etc. It’s been just very stressful.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735
